name: CDNify
overview:
At CDNify we are on a mission to make the internet a faster and more enjoyable experience for everyone.

Our content delivery network is a simple and effective way for startups, brands, content publishers, digital agencies and developers to improve the performance and reliability of the websites and applications.

CDNify rethinks how a CDN should work and offers a real alternative to the ‘one size fits all’ model most CDN’s currently use.

With CDNify you’re not tied into lengthy contracts or subscription fees. Users simply sign up and purchase blocks of data meaning you only ever pay for what you use.

CDNify offers you complete flexibility, allowing you to deliver rich media to your audience, regardless of where or how they are accessing your content.

With over 40 POPs globally, CDNify provides a real solution for businesses who are looking to reduce their costs, speed up load times and increase their conversion rate.
